attributes.action: To Make London A Independent State and for London to Join the EU.
attributes.additional_details: Via this EU referendum it has been made clear London Has always taken another direction in Politics,By most Londoners voting 'Remain' in the EU. It is therefore unfair for Londoners to pay the price of what they chose to not Happen.It is therefore extremely undemocratic.London is also  multicultural and is very much capable of independency.Therefore Holding a Referendum on Londons independency will hence clarify if Londoners truly feel if they are being stripped of their poltical views.
attributes.background: London has Been always known as Tradtionally 'Left wing.Having a History of Voting 'Labour'.London is in the Heart of Europe,We are proud of our diverse nation which we are so Famous for. So Let us Enjoin in what is good and forbid what is bad.
